Hero.Title: Home repair
Hero.Text: Imarat Group is engaged in the renovation of apartments, commercial premises, kindergartens and schools.
Hero.LineText: we are happy to make your dream home a reality

About.Title: About us
About.FirstText: Imarat Group was founded in 2020 and has more than 3 years of experience to date. The company's goal is to provide its clients with a cozy and comfortable space.
About.SecondText: The founder of the Imarat Group is Makhkamov Gulom Zokirovich, who has assembled a team of 40 professionals who are qualified specialists in their field.
About.Team: Our team consists of experienced professionals.

OurTeam.Title: We’ve got an entire team dedicated to supporting you and your business

OurServices.Title: Our services
OurServices.Text: we provide the best services for our customers

Neoclassical.Title: Neoclassical
Neoclassical.Text: Our neoclassical designs combine traditional Greek style and Roman elegance with modern design, creating timeless, custom designs for our clients

HighTech.Title: High Tech
HighTech.Text: The distinctive features of High-Tech are the absence of decor and the dominance of functionality, which in turn in the interior of the apartment places the main emphasis on the shape and texture of architectural details and objects. From materials, it allows you to freely experiment with combinations of glass, metal and plastic

Loft.Title: Loft
Loft.Text: The loft style is a relatively young industrial interior design, which is distinguished by an abundance of free space and the preservation of industrial details in the room. The main features of this direction are high ceilings, brick walls, cement floors, etc.

Classical.Title: Classical
Classical.Text: Features of the 'Classic' style is a fairly broad concept, meaning something that is recognized by absolutely everyone. It is based on laconicism, proportionality and rigor. There are no bright palettes, decorative elements or catchy prints.

Minimalism.Title: Minimalism
Minimalism.Text: The true style of minimalism in the interior is not associated with an ascetic lifestyle or financial need. It represents an aesthetically attractive environment characterized, above all, by space, functionality and a clear organization of space.

Contemporary.Title: Versace
Contemporary.Text: Creating a Versace style interior involves luxurious, glamorous and expressive design, often incorporating bright colors, exquisite patterns and precious materials

Modern.Title: Luxury
Modern.Text: It is always expensive, chic and sophisticated. Luxury interior design is usually created by professional and eminent designers who can subtly and without pompousness convey the high status of the owner of the apartment.

faq1.Title: Do we submit projects on time ?

faq2.Title: Do we guarantee quality ?
faq2.Text: We guarantee quality for one year. If something happens due to our fault, we will redo it at our expense.

faq3.Title: How is the payment processed ?
faq3.Text: The procedure for paying for repair work is specified in the contract and provides for both payment in cash and payment in the form of a bank transfer according to the details. The standard condition when signing a contract is an advance payment of 25% before the start of work, that is, within 3 days from the date of conclusion of the contract. Subsequent payment occurs in installments (25%) after each stage of completed work. ▪️ Prepayment - as a rule, goes towards the purchase of draft materials. ▪️ After completion of the 1st stage (plumbing and electrical work, installation, dismantling of walls). ▪️ After completion of the 2nd stage (after rough finishing work and preparation of walls and ceilings for final finishing). ▪️ After completion of the 3rd stage (finishing and complete completion of all work). After each stage, a certificate of completion of work is signed.

faq4.Title: Will the final result match the design project?
faq4.Text: If you order a design project and construction work, i.e. renovation of an apartment with turnkey interior design, then the final result will be 99% identical to what was planned in the sketches and visualizations. Three-dimensional visualization allows you to “try on” selected finishing materials in a room, look at the combination of colors, and evaluate the arrangement of furniture. Based on the measurements, Rhome designers create several layout options with the placement of furniture and lighting, kitchen equipment and plumbing fixtures. As a result, the design project meets your expectations as much as possible.

faq5.Title: Is the design project included as a bonus ?
faq5.Text: Unfortunately, no. The design project is a separate payment.

faq6.Title: Do we do renovations without a design project ?
faq6.Text: No, we do not. There are nuances that need to be considered.

Process.Title: We provide the best process experience

first.Title: Briefing
first.Text: First thing you determine the consept and model you want, then choose what colors and materials you want to use in your furniture.

second.Title: Processing
second.Text: When the briefing process in complete and what the client wants has been achieved. then we carr out the execution of the desired consept.

three.Title: Finishing
three.Text: After the process is complete, we will immediately carry out the finishing stage and we do it carefully and make sure there are no mistakes.

Team.EndTitle: dedicated to supporting you and your business
